sentences.en: A decade ago, Beep - Pagers were rarely seen, but now they are not rare.
sentences.cn: 十年前, 寻呼机挺少见的, 现在太不稀罕了.

sentences.en: A: Sorry , I missed you. Please leave a message after the beep.
sentences.cn: 对不起, 我没接到您的电话, 请在嘀声后留言.

sentences.en: And all I wanna hear is the message beep.
sentences.cn: 而我只想听一听手机的讯号声.

sentences.en: Does the computer beep on power-up?
sentences.cn: 电脑开机时发出“哔”的响声吗？

sentences.en: It can't pick up sound , or beep at us if something's wrong.
sentences.cn: 它又不能接收声音,又不能在事情不对劲儿的时候发出警报.

sentences.en: It hides in the cupboard when there a beep outside.
sentences.cn: 外面有一点响声就往柜子里躲.

sentences.en: Jeep jeep drive the jeep, off we go beep beep beep!
sentences.cn: 吉普车,开开开, 我们走吧,叭叭叭.

sentences.en: Leave your name and number at the sound of the beep.
sentences.cn: 请在比声后留下你的姓名和号码.

sentences.en: Minute Beep is the tool that hel you to reduce call charges.
sentences.cn: 通话计时提醒是一款帮助你减少手机通话费用的工具.

sentences.en: Minute Beep solves this problem for us by hanging up just before the time!
sentences.cn: 自动挂机会在我们挂机之前会发出Beep声解决了此问题!

sentences.en: Please leave your name and telephone number after the beep.
sentences.cn: 请在哔哔声后留下你的姓名及电话号码.

sentences.en: The ambulance must drive carefully and beep his horn to warn people.
sentences.cn: 救护车必须要很小心地驾驶,而且要按喇叭警告人们.

sentences.en: The horn on the bus goes beep , beep, beep, all day long.
This information is displayed on the drivers'displays and a beep sounds.
sentences.cn: 这条信息显示在司机的显示屏上,同时会发出“嘟嘟”的提示音.

sentences.en: This is a recording. Please leave your massage after the beep.
sentences.cn: 这是电话录音. 请在“噼”声后留言.

words.tran_cn: 能发出哔哔声音的仪器；导弹遥控员
